itunes:summary:
Topher “The Patriot” joins the show to talk about being a conservative (or rather, patriotic) rapper and how that affects who the industry allows to listen to his music, independent music production, what it’s like to be known as a “political” musician, and the new gun control laws being proposed in the wake of the Uvalde shooting — plus crypto is in the toilet.
